abstract: Editorial urges World Bank to adopt human rights criteria as it updates policies that guard against increasing environmental and social risks when it makes loans or backs project; notes bank's own research shows that promoting human rights makes economic as well as social and political sense.

headline.print_headline: The World Bank Should Champion Rights
headline.main: The World Bank Should Champion Human Rights

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: By mandate, the World Bank is an apolitical institution. That does not preclude it from doing more to protect human rights.
lead_paragraph: By mandate, the World Bank is an apolitical institution. That does not preclude it from doing more to protect human rights.
